question: Who among the following was not a female member of the Constituent Assembly?
explanation: The Constituent Assembly consisted of 15 women members. Their names are as follows: 1. Ammu Swaminathan; 2. Dakshayani Velayudhan; 3. Begum Aizaz Rasul; 4. Durgabai Deshmukh; 5. Hansa Jivraj Mehta; 6. Kamla Chaudhary; 7. Leela Roy; 8. Malati Choudhury; 9. Purnima Banerjee; 10. Rajkumari Amrit Kaur; 11. Renuka Ray; 12. Sarojini Naidu; 13. Sucheta Kriplani; 14. Vijalakshami Pandit; and 15. Annie Mascarene
